channel.title: CVE Feed for SnakeYAML -- SnakeYAML
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SnakeYAML -- SnakeYAML

item.title: CVE-2022-38752|2024-07-22T14:03:52.086Z -- snakeyaml -- snakeyaml
item.description: Using snakeYAML to parse untrusted YAML files may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by stack-overflow.
